Articles.Content:
The second edition of Kerbalkon is nearly upon us. Next Thursday and Friday we'll be hosting this digital event and we have a lot to show you!

Check out the Schedule

Edited December 6, 2013 by KasperVld
really cannot wait to sit down and watch this, cant believe im actually going to be part of it too
See that you do not loose any recordings!
Well this sucks I have to work to. you tube will be my friend this weekend

Sweet there'll be links to each section video!

YEAH .23!!!!!!!! KerbalKon!

Magical hour? wonder if it involves a boulder...

OH and if anyone needs a fast science-lab-swap-able lander for .23, here's one I made.

Edited December 12, 2013 by Avera9eJoe

I may be twisting this up wrong, but does..

// 12PM-1PM // Pleborian & Streetlamp // Launching Through 0.23

mean 0.23 is being release then? that would make it a first thing Friday morning release right after the big..

// 11AM-12PM // The Squad All Stars // Live From Squad HQ

Rumors Rumors Rumors!!!!

Just my .2

-Marcuzzi
I hope the shows can be viewed as a rerun; I have to work.

For those who haven't noticed the very right side of the schedule it has a spot for a video link for each program time. This may mean it will appear only when they are broadcasting. More likely it will mean a twitch/youtube link that will stay up long after the kon ends.
I hope they show off those robots they got!

I may be twisting this up wrong, but does..

// 12PM-1PM // Pleborian & Streetlamp // Launching Through 0.23

mean 0.23 is being release then? that would make it a first thing Friday morning release right after the big..

// 11AM-12PM // The Squad All Stars // Live From Squad HQ

Rumors Rumors Rumors!!!!

Just my .2

-Marcuzzi

0.23 isn't coming out by then or before then, but you miiiiiight want to pay attention to a press release coming later today.

I will definitively watch this.

Sorry schoolz, no time for you today!

0.23 isn't coming out by then or before then, but you miiiiiight want to pay attention to a press release coming later today.

Confound you and your crypticism!

0.23 isn't coming out by then or before then, but you miiiiiight want to pay attention to a press release coming later today.

Rowsdower, I'll tell you what.. you buy me this so I don't have to keep hitting F5 myself:

and i'll get you this as a thank you

Edited December 11, 2013 by Marcuzzi

Hey at KerbalKon make mention of this thread:

SHOWCASE MASTER THREAD - All Epic Engineering and Design Showcases Referenced in One Place!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60744-SHOWCASE-SHOWCASE-MASTER-THREAD-Looking-for-Ideas-All-Showcases-in-One-Place!

I'm also the author of the KSP Wiki Campaign series, with some contributions by others. A lot of players have tried sandboxing their way through the KSP Wiki Campaigns both before campaign mode, and after as an alternative. I'm available to be interviewed if interested. Send me a PM.

0.23 isn't coming out by then or before then, but you miiiiiight want to pay attention to a press release coming later today.

Oh god the suspense!

Wow Scott, Kurt, Pleb, Elysium-all the stars! And that particular 1 hour event called "KSP 0.23" by C7 interests me.

I mean this is supposed to be an aerodynamics update and C7 is based on aerodynamics, sooo..........

Btw C7, gotta love you, I dl'ed your pack back in 0.14 and made my first KSP RCS VTOL!

...this is supposed to be an aerodynamics update...

What? Where do you get that? I was under the impression that it was primarily adding to science collection and adding tweakables. Is there something I missed?
Where is the space-been personage that was promised?

Where is the space-been personage that was promised?

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ed_Lu
Ummmm, we can watch previously streamed videos on Twitch, right, right? Oh God please say yes.

Ummmm, we can watch previously streamed videos on Twitch, right, right? Oh God please say yes.

They are usually available, don't see any reason why they wouldn't be.

They are usually available, don't see any reason why they wouldn't be.
Twitch recently changed the way they handle the archives, but I think we'll be recording by other means.
Does it have to be on Thursday? Some of us have school, so we'll be missing out big time.
Fear not! I'm sure the highlights will be posted on the forums and many of the shows will be recorded as well, so you can view them later

Twitch recently changed the way they handle the archives, but I think we'll be recording by other means.

Thanks Dahud, might as well take this opportunity to say I love your streams!
